website_summaries.verdict: A hydrating cleanser that’s good for dry skin with a light, pleasant scent.

product_meta.description:
This creamy, hydrating cleanser is a spa experience in a tube. It emulsifies makeup and removes impurities while quenching skin with essential daily vitamins that revitalize. Infuses skin with high levels of antioxidant vitamin C to brighten and hydrate as it cleanses. Enhanced with vitamin A-derived retinyl palmitate to boost radiance and brighten sun-damaged skin. Ideal for sensitive, redness-prone, dry or dehydrated skin, and for post-treatment use. Suitable for cleansing irritated and itchy skin conditions

IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by Dr. Marc Ronert, a plastic surgeon, and represented by a network of 20,000 skincare professionals.
